author: djrtwo
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.3.0-rc.0` -- **Accumulation** -- released!

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.3.0-rc.0

Target for both Capella and 4844 January devnet sprint

This is the first release candidate for Capella. Unless major issues are uncovered in the January devnet sprint, we expect this to be feature complete and stable.

Iterative work on 4844, full rebase on Capella functionality -- test vectors reflect this

Huge shoutout to everyone that has poured so much time and effort into Capella specs, refinements, prototypes, and more! excited to see it get over the edge
